entry.content:
Awoke in a navy bathed chamber in stone
All alone with a slate made to aid me in tow
I break open the gate into nature and so
All I know is my fate in this age is to roam
From the Great Plateau to the flakes of snow
I must raid these ancient gateways of old
And make haste cause days wasted may make me
Way late to save this creation of the makers from foes
Got a battle pre planned with Calamity Ganon
But I have to prepare so I have an advantage
So I travel the land first to grab me some gadgets
Unravel the past from the saddles of stallions
With a knack for combat, leave all Guardians thrashed
I am one with the wildlife my heart's with the grass
Break apart attackers like shards in a blast
The one true Master of Swords in the land

No challenge has ever been left behind
Face shit head on in this legend of mine
Trek from the Temple of Time because Zelda said why
I am the light and I'm destined to shine
The creatures of evil see death from a mile
They fret and they hide when I step in their sight
There's a icy cold feeling they get when I fight that
Signifies the end, call it Breath of The Wild
So breathe it in, I'm leapin' in the air with arrows, piercin' skin
Even in the freezing peaks single man legioning
Don't pick a fight with me, I'm not joking No I'm dead serious
So watch out above for a boulder over head, genius
No Bokoblin could ever stand in my way
I'll just stand behind a crate, wait, then
Flurry Rush their lives away
Whether sword or an axe, a bow
No matter, I'll still leave your ass a Poe

You hear that sound coming at a breakneck pace
Skatin down the hill on my shield, jumping straight at your face
Got wardrobes of armor, I'm safe from the danger
If you see a shadow below then you're way too late
I'm climbing to new heights and I'm on the hunt for some nice
Mountaintops to glide through the sky and discover uncharted sights
Never stoppin this thing, never optin' to split
You should never pause even blink or you'll get a present from Link
Adding runes to my sheikah slate Maggot choose what'll be your fate
Scram or you get magnesis aimed at your face homie gravitate
Hyrule has to be saved, and the cycle has to be changed
This time when ganon is slain, he'll be finally banished away
Through woods and the sky, desert and ice
Controlling ancient powers and setting them alive
So get with the times in this era and try your hand besting
this guy you will never survive in the Breath of the Wild

entry.title: Marc Almond - Tainted Love - 가사
entry.content:
Sometimes I feel I've got to

Get away

The love we share

Now I'll run from you

I give you all a boy could give you
Take my tears and that's not nearly all
